Description: Web-based hosting service for version control using Git.
Name: GitHub

Methods.Name: Close Issue
Methods.Description: Changes the state of an issue to "closed".

Methods.Name: Get Issue
Methods.Description: Gets the details of the specified Issue,

Methods.Name: List Issues/Pull Requests
Methods.Description: List all Issues and Pull Requests against a repository.

Methods.Name: List New Issues/Pull Requests
Methods.Description: List new Issues and Pull Requests from a repository created since the last run time.

Methods.Name: List Updated Issues/Pull Requests
Methods.Description: Gets a list of updated issues from a repository made since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Create Issue
Methods.Description: Creates an issue in a specified repository.

Methods.Name: Update Issue
Methods.Description: Update a specified issue.

Methods.Name: Search Issues/Pull Requests
Methods.Description: List all Issues and Pull Requests that match your search query.

Methods.Name: List New/Updated Issues/Pull Requests
Methods.Description: List new and updated issues from a repository since the last run time.

Methods.Name: Get Issue Comment
Methods.Description: Retrieves the issue comment specified by ID.

Methods.Name: List Repository Issue Comments
Methods.Description: List all comments for a repository.

Methods.Name: List Updated Repository Issue Comments
Methods.Description: List all comments for a repository updated since lastrun.

Methods.Name: Update Issue Comment
Methods.Description: Updates the body of the specified issue comment.

Methods.Name: Add Issue Comment
Methods.Description: Adds a comment to a specified issue.

Methods.Name: List Issue Comments
Methods.Description: List all comments for an issue.

Methods.Name: List Root Files & Folders
Methods.Description: List files folders of a repository.

Methods.Name: List File Commit Dates
Methods.Description: List Commit dates for file

Methods.Name: Get File
Methods.Description: Get a file.

Methods.Name: List Files & Folders
Methods.Description: List the files and folders of a repository branch or folder.

Methods.Name: Issue Updated
Methods.Description: This webhook is fired when opened, edited, deleted, pinned, unpinned, closed, reopened, assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, locked, unlocked, transferred, milestoned, or demilestoned.

Methods.Name: Repository Push
Methods.Description: This webhook is fired when one or more commits are pushed to a repository branch or tag.

Methods.Name: Update Label
Methods.Description: Update a label.

Methods.Name: Create Label
Methods.Description: Create a label.

Methods.Name: Delete Label
Methods.Description: Delete a label.

Methods.Name: List Labels
Methods.Description: List all labels.

Methods.Name: Get Label
Methods.Description: Get a label.

Methods.Name: List Events Received by Authenticated User
Methods.Description: Display the events that have been received for the authenticated user.

Methods.Name: List Public Events for Authenticated User
Methods.Description: Display the public events for authenticated user.

Methods.Name: List Public Events for Organization
Methods.Description: Display the public events for an organization

Methods.Name: List Events for Authenticated User
Methods.Description: Display the events for the authenticated user.

Methods.Name: List Events for Repo
Methods.Description: Display the events for a repository

Methods.Name: List New Events for Repo
Methods.Description: Display the events for a repository since the last successful cycle run.

Methods.Name: List Events Received by User
Methods.Description: Display the events that have been received for a user.

Methods.Name: List Organization Events for Authenticated User
Methods.Description: Display the user's organization dashboard.

Methods.Name: List Public Events
Methods.Description: Display the public event

Methods.Name: List Public Events for Network
Methods.Description: Display the public events for a network of repositories

Methods.Name: Get User
Methods.Description: Retrieve details of the authenticated user

Methods.Name: List Authenticated User's Organizations
Methods.Description: List all the organizations for the specified user. This only lists organizations that your authorization allows you to operate on in some way

Methods.Name: List Organizations Repositories
Methods.Description: List all the repositories of an organization.

Methods.Name: List User's Organizations
Methods.Description: List public organization memberships for the specified user. This method only lists public memberships, regardless of authentication. If you need to fetch all of the organization memberships (public and private) for the authenticated user, use the List Authenticated Organizations method.

Methods.Name: List Organizations Members
Methods.Description: List all the members of an organization.

Methods.Name: List Repository Branches
Methods.Description: List all branches of a repository.

Methods.Name: Get User's Repository Permissions
Methods.Description: Get all permissions of a user in a repository. This method contains a true/false exit, where the true route is taken if the user is a member of the repository, while the false exit is taken if they are not.

Methods.Name: List Repository Collaborators
Methods.Description: List all collaborators of a repository.
